content: As of the end of Q4, the accumulative pieces of content on our platform had reached 490 million, representing a year-over-year increase of 39%, of which the number of questions and answers increased to 420 million, representing a year-over-year increase of 33.8%. Worthy  of note In q4 2021, our non-advertising business, which mainly includes our content-commerce solutions, and paid membership enjoyed accelerated growth, contributing 62.9% to the total revenue in Q4 compared to the 38.6% in the same period last year.
